game.name: Cyber Avenger
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 사이버 어벤져Cyber Avenger는 파괴적인 잠재력을 지닌 혁신적인 발명품을 획득한 테러리스트 그룹을 막기 위한 위험한 미션에서 뛰어난 기술을 지닌 비밀 작전요원으로 활약하는 탑다운 액션 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cyber Avenger is a top-down action game where you take on the role of a highly skilled covert operative on a dangerous mission to stop a group of terrorists. You must navigate through five maps, facing a variety of enemies, including shotgunners, snipers, melee fighters, kamikazes, and more.

reviewHighlights.text: I've never been good at top-down games. So I probably won't be able to finish it. Although I want to do more.
